definitions.definition: To close and reopen both eyes quickly.
definitions.example: The loser in the staring game is the person who blinks first.

definitions.definition: To flash on and off at regular intervals.
definitions.example: The blinking text on the screen was distracting.

definitions.definition: To perform the smallest action that could solicit a response.
To shut out of sight; to evade; to shirk.
To turn slightly sour, or blinky, as beer, milk, etc.
To teleport, mostly for short distances.
The act of something that blinks.
definitions.example: the steady blinkings of lights on the console
The blinking telly isn't working again.
